executeTransaction(uint256,address,bytes.details: Executes an exchange method call in the context of signer.

params.salt: Arbitrary number to ensure uniqueness of transaction hash.
params.signature: Proof of signer transaction by signer.

isValidSignature(bytes32,address,bytes).details: Verifies that a hash has been signed by the given signer.

params.signature: Proof that the hash has been signed by signer.
params.signerAddress: Address that should have signed the given hash.

isValidSignature(bytes32,address,bytes).return: True if the address recovered from the provided signature matches the input signer address.

preSign(bytes32,address,bytes).details: Approves a hash on-chain using any valid signature type.      After presigning a hash, the preSign signature type will become valid for that hash and signer.

params.signature: Proof that the hash has been signed by signer.
params.signerAddress: Address that should have signed the given hash.

setSignatureValidatorApproval(address,bo.details: Approves/unnapproves a Validator contract to verify signatures on signer's behalf.

params.approval: Approval or disapproval of  Validator contract.
